attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"By comparison to many other European Countries, Britain has fewer public holidays and none at all for a period of some three months between the August public holiday and Christmas. 

For many people this is a very long period of employment and a Monday or three in Sep, Oct, Nov would break up a very long working period. Work hard and play hard - one without the other does not help the health of the nation.

rejection.details:
There are a number of petitions on this subject including:

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Democracy-Day/
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/November-11th/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
